survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and comfort with their current workplace ergonomic setups to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current office chair?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current office chair?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your desk setup (height, space, etc.)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your desk setup (height, space, etc.)?

questions.question_text: Do you experience any discomfort or pain related to your workstation setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple frequency scale. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Do you experience any discomfort or pain related to your workstation setup?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the type of discomfort or pain you experience.
questions.routing_logic: Only if Q3 is 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the type of discomfort or pain you experience.
script.routing_logic: Only if Q3 is 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to assess current ergonomic setups. Ensure the options are clear and mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in attending ergonomic training sessions?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in attending ergonomic training sessions?

questions.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or support would you like the company to provide?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or support would you like the company to provide?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall lighting in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall lighting in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your current workstation setup allows you to work productively?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
